title: Lip Service
description: My new neighbor is an online sex advice vlogger — but she doesn’t know that I knowOut of curiosity, I checked out her videos. Who wouldn’t?I didn’t count on being tempted by her sexy voice or her full lips.Too bad she’s off limits.Being a single dad isn’t easy, and I have rules — no relationships and no f*cking anyone my daughter knows.But when I become the subject of her posts, I can’t keep my hands off her any longer.I have to teach her everything she got wrong in her videos.
author: Simone Sowood
